00031 enum ColourSpaces { GREYSCALE, sRGB, CIELAB };
00032 
00034 enum CompressionType { UNCOMPRESSED, JPEG, DEFLATE };

00040 class RawTile{
00041 
00042  public:
00043 
00045   int tileNum;
00046 
00048   int resolution;
00049 
00051   int hSequence;
00052 
00054   int vSequence;
00055 
00057   CompressionType compressionType;
00058 
00060   int quality;
00061 
00063   std::string filename;
00064 
00065 
00066  public:
00067 
00068 
00070   void *data;
00071 
00074 
00075   int localData;
00076 
00078   int dataLength;
00079 
00081   unsigned int width;
00082 
00084   unsigned int height;
00085 
00087   int channels;
00088 
00090   int bpc;
00091 
00092 
00094 
00103   RawTile( int tn = 0, int res = 0, int hs = 0, int vs = 0,
00104            int w = 0, int h = 0, int c = 0, int b = 0 ) {
00105     width = w; height = h; bpc = b; dataLength = 0; data = NULL;
00106     tileNum = tn; resolution = res; hSequence = hs ; vSequence = vs;
00107     localData = 0; channels = c; compressionType = UNCOMPRESSED; quality = 0;
00108   };
00109 
00110 
00112   ~RawTile() {
00113     if( data && localData ) free( data );
00114   }
00115 
00116 
00118   RawTile( const RawTile& tile ) {
00119 
00120     dataLength = tile.dataLength;
00121     width = tile.width;
00122     height = tile.height;
00123     channels = tile.channels;
00124     bpc = tile.bpc;
00125     tileNum = tile.tileNum;
00126     resolution = tile.resolution;
00127     hSequence = tile.hSequence;
00128     vSequence = tile.vSequence;
00129     compressionType = tile.compressionType;
00130     quality = tile.quality;
00131     filename = tile.filename;
00132 
00133     data = malloc( dataLength );
00134 
00135     if( data && (dataLength > 0) && tile.data ){
00136       memcpy( data, tile.data, dataLength );
00137       localData = 1;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141 
00143   RawTile& operator= ( const RawTile& tile ) {
00144 
00145     dataLength = tile.dataLength;
00146     width = tile.width;
00147     height = tile.height;
00148     channels = tile.channels;
00149     bpc = tile.bpc;
00150     tileNum = tile.tileNum;
00151     resolution = tile.resolution;
00152     hSequence = tile.hSequence;
00153     vSequence = tile.vSequence;
00154     compressionType = tile.compressionType;
00155     quality = tile.quality;
00156     filename = tile.filename;
00157 
00158     data = malloc( dataLength );
00159 
00160     if( data && (dataLength > 0) && tile.data ){
00161       memcpy( data, tile.data, dataLength );
00162       localData = 1;
00163     }
00164 
00165     return *this;
00166   }
00167 
00168 
00170   int size() { return dataLength; }
00171 
00172 
00174   friend int operator == ( const RawTile& A, const RawTile& B ) {
00175     if( (A.tileNum == B.tileNum) &&
00176         (A.resolution == B.resolution) &&
00177         (A.hSequence == B.hSequence) &&
00178         (A.vSequence == B.vSequence) &&
00179         (A.compressionType == B.compressionType) &&
00180         (A.quality == B.quality) &&
00181         (A.filename == B.filename) ){
00182       return( 1 );
00183     }
00184     else return( 0 );
00185   }
00186 
00187 
00189   friend int operator != ( const RawTile& A, const RawTile& B ) {
00190     if( (A.tileNum == B.tileNum) &&
00191         (A.resolution == B.resolution) &&
00192         (A.hSequence == B.hSequence) &&
00193         (A.vSequence == B.vSequence) &&
00194         (A.compressionType == B.compressionType) &&
00195         (A.quality == B.quality) &&
00196         (A.filename == B.filename) ){
00197       return( 0 );
00198     }
00199     else return( 1 );
00200   }
